keys: Geografía SESE. Entornos humanos. Cuidado del medio ambiente. Páginas web relevantes
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>8300</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Local Environment Questionnaires</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionarios sobre el entorno local</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceistneoirí faoin Timpeallacht Áitiúil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lokale Umgebung-Fragebögen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Questionnaires d'Environnement Local</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questionários Do Ambiente Local</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questionari Dell'Ambiente Locale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τοπικά ερωτηματολόγια περιβάλλοντος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Series of questionnaires aimed at helping the children gather information about their locality (schools, streets, clubs, shops/retail outlets and local factories).</string>
            <string language="es">Serie de cuestionarios cuyo fin es ayudar a los niños a reunir información sobre su localidad (escuelas, calles, clubes, tiendas, mercados y fábricas de la localidad).</string>
            <string language="ga">Sraith ceistneoirí dírithe ar chúnamh a thabhairt do leanaí eolas a bhailiú faoin gcomharsanacht (scoileanna, sráideanna, clubanna, siopaí/asraon miondíola agus monarchana áitiúla).</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía SESE. Entornos humanos. Cuidado del medio ambiente. Páginas web relevantes</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Human Environments</string>
            <string language="ga">Timpeallachtaí Daonna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Environmental Care</string>
            <string language="ga">Cúram Timpeallachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Relevant Websites</string>
            <string language="ga">Láithreáin Ghréasáin Bhainteacha</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reihe Fragebögen strebte an, den Kindversammlung
Informationen über ihre Stelle (Schulen, Straßen, Vereine, 
shops/retail Anschlüsse und lokale Fabriken) zu helfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La série de questionnaires a visé à aider les 
informations de rassemblement d'enfants sur leur localité (écoles, 
rues, clubs, sorties de shops/retail et usines locales).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A série dos questionários visou ajudar à 
informação do recolhimento das crianças sobre seu locality 
(escolas, ruas, clubes, tomadas de shops/retail e fábricas locais).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La serie di questionari puntati su aiutando i 
bambini riunisce le informazioni sulla loro località (scuole, 
vie, randelli, prese di shops/retail e fabbriche locali).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σειρά ερωτηματολογίων στόχευσε στη βοήθεια των 
παιδιών να συγκεντρωθούν οι πληροφορίες για την τοποθεσία τους 
(σχολεία, οδοί, λέσχες, καταστήματα/λιανικές έξοδοι και τοπικά 
εργοστάσια).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschliche Umgebungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimaobacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relevante Web site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géographie de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Environnements Humains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Soin Environnemental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sites Web Appropriés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geografia de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ambienti Umani</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cura Ambientale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web site Relativi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωγραφία SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
